name: DGCP Proof 427 | Off-Grid Inverter Activation Under Energy Constraints — Jan 2, 2026
description:
This proof records the activation of the off-grid inverter system at MaMeeFarm™.

Electricity is a limited resource within the farm’s DGCP operation.
The inverter is powered only during constrained working hours due to
insufficient battery storage to sustain continuous overnight use.

This proof documents real operational pressure:
working with limited energy, limited time, and no infrastructure redundancy,
while maintaining uninterrupted data integrity under the DGCP framework.

No simulation. No abstraction. Only real constraints and real work.

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
This work is licensed under the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework.
All content is part of the MaMeeFarm™ Real-Work Data & Philosophy archive.
